summary: A samurai goes to extraordinary lengths to provide for his family.
cast: Kiichi Nakai|Kôichi Satô|Yui Natsukawa|Takehiro Murata|Miki Nakatani|Yûji Miyake|Masayoshi Haneda|Yoshinori Hiruma|Keisuke Horibe|Atsushi Itô|Hideaki Itô|Ryô Kase|Momo Nakayama|Eugene Nomura|Ayumu Saitô|Masato Sakai|Sansei Shiomi|Kôji Tsukamoto|Sora Tôma|Dai Watanabe|Tatsuo Yamada|Akihiro Ôishi
title: Mibu gishi den
